Name: maximize_project_budget
Description: Maximize total budget across all projects

Name: maximize_team_size
Description: Maximize total number of team members across teams

Name: minimize_worker_start_date
Description: Minimize average worker start date (prefer experienced)

Name: maximize_feature_priority
Description: Maximize sum of priority scores of implemented features

Name: maximize_story_points
Description: Maximize total story points completed per sprint

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Minimize total effort spent on high-severity blockers

Name: maximize_velocity_trend
Description: Maximize positive trend in team velocity

Name: minimize_number_of_blockers
Description: Minimize total number of active blockers

Name: maximize_documentation_coverage
Description: Maximize number of features with documentation

Name: minimize_release_delay
Description: Minimize difference between planned and actual release

Name: maximize_stakeholder_influence
Description: Maximize sum of influence levels of participating stakeholders
